# Purple Visualizer

<a href="javascript:eval(atob('''));" style="padding: 20px; margin: 20px; background-color: #330055; display: inline-block; border-radius: 5px; color: #FFF; text-decoration: none; ">Purple Visualizer</a>

Drag the button onto your Bookmarks bar.

To use, click the previously added bookmark when reviewing your OSHPark PCB. The URL should resemble something like "https://oshpark.com/uploads/xxxxxx/approval/new"


_hackathon-grade code quality._
